DiscourseReplaceTalkPages.description: Replace talk pages with Discourse threads.

DiscourseBaseURL.description: Base URL of the Discourse instance. Do not include trailing slash.

DiscourseAPIKey.description: API key for the Discourse instance. Must be global with read/write permissions.

DiscourseAPIUsername.description: Username used to process all API requests.

DiscourseTargetNamespaces.description: Namespaces to replace talk page buttons with Discourse threads and show related posts.

DiscourseTargetSkins.description: Skins (in lowercase) to replace talk page buttons with Discourse threads and show related posts.

DiscourseExcludeStrings.description: List of strings. If a page title contains any of these, the talk page link will NOT be replaced.

DiscourseSquarePFPsForAll.description: Use square profile pictures instead of rounded.

DiscourseSquarePFPsForUsersWithTitles.description: Use square profile pictures instead of rounded for users with certain titles.

DiscourseUseNoFollowOnForumLinks.description: Add nofollow to all links to the forum. Not recommended for SEO.

DiscourseOpenForumLinksInNewTab.description: Open all links to the forum in a new tab using `_blank`, otherwise uses the default behavior of the browser.
